targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  inserted_at AS "time",
  efficiency
FROM cars
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
	sum(cost)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit') as "distance_$length_unit"
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car_id AND $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT
	SUM(charge_energy_used)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id 
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

SELECT
	SUM(charge_energy_added)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id 
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

SELECT
	( SUM(charge_energy_added) * 100 / SUM(charge_energy_used) )
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id 
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
		cp.id,
		cp.charge_energy_added,
		CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC'
				 ELSE 'AC'
		END AS current,
		cp.charge_energy_used
	FROM charging_processes cp
  RIGHT JOIN charges ON cp.id = charges.charging_process_id
  WHERE
	  cp.car_id = $car_id
	  AND cp.charge_energy_added > 0.01
	  AND $__timeFilter(start_date)
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
	now() AS time,
	sum(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used)) AS value,
	current AS metric
FROM data
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY metric DESC;

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
) / (
	SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit')
	FROM positions
	WHERE $__timeFilter(date) AND car_id = $car_id
) * 100

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
) / (
  SELECT sum(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used))
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE $__timeFilter(end_date) AND car_id = $car_id
)

SELECT
	sum(greatest(charge_energy_added,charge_energy_used))
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	$__timeFilter(end_date)
	AND car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01
	AND cost = 0;

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS true
		AND c.charger_voltage = 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND (addr.name ILIKE '%supercharger%' OR geo.name ILIKE '%supercharger%')
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS true
		AND c.charger_voltage = 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND CASE 
			WHEN (cp.geofence_id IS NOT NULL) THEN (addr.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%' AND geo.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%')
			ELSE addr.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%'
		END
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS NOT true
		AND c.charger_voltage != 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(end_date)
  AND cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

SELECT
  inserted_at AS "time",
  efficiency
FROM cars
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(inserted_at)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
	$total_charging_cost

SELECT 
	($total_charging_cost / ceil(((EXTRACT(epoch from age(updated_at, inserted_at)) / 86400)) / 30)) total_per_month
FROM cars
WHERE
	id = $car_id

SELECT 
	($total_charged / ceil(((EXTRACT(epoch from age(updated_at, inserted_at)) / 86400)) / 30)) total_per_month
FROM cars
WHERE
	id = $car_id

SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit') as "distance_$length_unit"
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car_id
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT
	count(*)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	charge_energy_added > 0.01
	AND car_id = $car_id;

SELECT
	SUM(charge_energy_used)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id 
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

SELECT
	$total_charged

SELECT
	( SUM(charge_energy_added) * 100 / SUM(charge_energy_used) )
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id 
	AND charge_energy_added > 0.01

SELECT
	sum(greatest(charge_energy_added,charge_energy_used))
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01
	AND cost = 0;

WITH data AS (
  SELECT
		cp.id,
		cp.charge_energy_added,
		CASE WHEN NULLIF(mode() within group (order by charger_phases),0) is null THEN 'DC'
				 ELSE 'AC'
		END AS current
	FROM charging_processes cp
  RIGHT JOIN charges ON cp.id = charges.charging_process_id
  WHERE
	  cp.car_id = $car_id
	  AND cp.charge_energy_added > 0.01
  GROUP BY 1,2
)
SELECT
	now() AS time,
	sum(charge_energy_added) AS value,
	current AS metric
FROM data
GROUP BY 3
ORDER BY metric DESC;

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE car_id = $car_id
) / (
	SELECT convert_km((max(odometer) - min(odometer))::numeric, '$length_unit')
	FROM positions
	WHERE car_id = $car_id
) * 100

SELECT (
  SELECT sum(cost)
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE car_id = $car_id
) / (
  SELECT sum(greatest(charge_energy_added, charge_energy_used))
  FROM charging_processes
  WHERE car_id = $car_id
)

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS true
		AND c.charger_voltage = 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND (addr.name ILIKE '%supercharger%' OR geo.name ILIKE '%supercharger%')
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	LEFT JOIN addresses addr ON addr.id = cp.address_id
	LEFT JOIN geofences geo ON geo.id = geofence_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS true
		AND c.charger_voltage = 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND CASE 
			WHEN (cp.geofence_id IS NOT NULL) THEN (addr.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%' AND geo.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%')
			ELSE addr.name NOT ILIKE '%supercharger%'
		END
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

WITH data AS (
	SELECT c.charging_process_id 
	FROM charges c
	LEFT JOIN charging_processes cp ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
	WHERE 
		c.fast_charger_present IS NOT true
		AND c.charger_voltage != 2
		AND cp.car_id = $car_id
	GROUP BY 1
)
SELECT
	sum(cp.cost) as total
FROM
	charging_processes cp, data
WHERE
  cp.cost IS NOT NULL
  AND cp.id IN (data.charging_process_id);

SELECT to_char(end_date,'YYYY-MM') as "Date",
       sum(cost) as "Amount"
FROM charging_processes
WHERE 
  car_id = $car_id
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT to_char(end_date,'YYYY') as "Year",
       sum(cost) as "Amount"
FROM charging_processes
WHERE 
  car_id = $car_id
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;

WHERE

FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id;

	sum(charge_energy_added)
FROM
	charging_processes
WHERE
	car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01;

	sum(charge_energy_added)
FROM

WHERE
	car_id = $car_id AND charge_energy_added > 0.01;
